body:
I am getting a rather vague error message when attempting to build cntk with spack (gitrev: bb29ec1) on ORNL Titan. The following is the output that I am getting from spack:

> titan-ext2: ./bin/spack install cntk %gcc@4.9.3 
> titan-ext2: ==> Error: 'shared'

This error message appears irregardless of what node type I attempt to compile on (login, service, and compute all show the same error) and it only appears with cntk (other packages compile/install without issue). 

What exactly is this error message indicating and what would I need to do to sidestep this problem?
title: Vague "==> Error: 'shared'" message when attempting to build cntk
